channel.title: Projects on Andres Garcia-Saavedra
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Andres Garcia-Saavedra

item.title: 5G-TRANSFORMER
item.description: 5G-Transformer defines three novel building blocks that will be developed and demonstrated integrating the aforementioned three vertical industries: Vertical Slicer as the logical entry point (i.e., one stop shop) for verticals to support the creation of their respective transport slices in a short time-scale (in the order of minutes). Service Orchestrator to orchestrate the federation of transport networking and computing resources from multiple domains and manage their allocation to slices.
